Headline: #75 74th-75th Temporary Reroute at 75th/Rhodes
ShortDescription: 75 74th-75th buses are temporarily rerouted via 75th, Cottage Grove, 79th, King Drive, and 75th due to, street blockage at 75th/Rhodes.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#75 74th-75th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 75th, Cottage Grove, 79th, King Drive, and 75th due to, street blockage at 75th/Rhodes.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Red Line Delays
ShortDescription: Red Line trains are running w/residual delays and congestion following earlier police activity near 79th. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Red Line trains are running with residual delays and congestion following earlier police activity near 79th.

Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
